title: Google\Cloud\TextToSpeech\V1\SynthesizeSpeechResponse
name: SynthesizeSpeechResponse
description:
The message returned to the client by the SynthesizeSpeech method.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.texttospeech.v1.SynthesizeSpeechResponse

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.audio_content
params.description: The audio data bytes encoded as specified in the request, including the header for encodings that are wrapped in containers (e.g. MP3, OGG_OPUS). For LINEAR16 audio, we include the WAV header. Note: as with all bytes fields, protobuffers use a pure binary representation, whereas JSON representations use base64.
